titleStmt.title: The faith of dying Jacob, or, God's presence with his church not withstanding the death of his eminent servants being several sermons from Gen. 48, 21, and Israel said unto Joseph, Behold, I die, but God shall be with you : occasioned by the death of Mr. Isaac Hubbard : with the memorials of his life and death and advice to his young son / by R. Gouge.
titleStmt.author: Gouge, R. (Robert), 1630-1705.
